title: Apollo.io | Senior Frontend Engineer | L5
content:
Education - B.Tech, Tier-3 College
Years of experience - 5.5
Current Company - Product based
Current Compensation - 43 LPA(fixed) + 25 LPA(ESOPs)

Company: Apollo.io
Title: Senior Frontend Engineer(L5)
Location: Remote for ever
Base Salary: 60LPA INR
Performance-based bonus: 6 LPA INR
Signing Bonus: 4LPA INR
ESOPs: 62,000 USD vested over 4 years

Currently I'm waiting on other offers as I've more interviews planned.

title: VISA | SDE-1
content:
Education: B.Tech CS from Tier-2
Years of Experience: 2.5
Current company: Product based company


Date of the Offer: Jan 2025
Company: Visa
Title/Level: Software Dev. I
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 22.5 (19L Fixed +1.9L bonus + pf+gratuity)

How is the offer look guys ?
I asked them for stocks and joining bonus but they are not agreeing for it.
Also should i join as a SDE-1 as i already have 2.5 YOE any suggestions?

title: Amazon | System Development Engineer 2 | Bangalore | Offer
content:
```
* Years of Experience: 2.5 years
* Prior Experience: Software engineer 2 at a leading company in the semiconductor domain
* Date of the Offer: Jan 2025
* Company: Amazon
* Title/Level: System Development Engineer 2 (L5)
* Location: Bangalore, India
* Salary: 32,00,000 INR
* Relocation: 1,50,000 INR
* Signing Bonus: 11,00,000 INR (1st year) + 9,00,000 INR (2nd year)
* Stock bonus: 35,000 USD worth of stocks (Vesting Cycle -> 5%, 15%, 40% and 40%) 
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 45,00,000 INR (first year)
* Benefits: Standard Amazon benefits
```

Interview experience -> https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/6351740/Amazon-or-SDE-2-or-Bangalore-or-Jan-2025-or-Offer

title: Oracle Cerner | PMTS | Banglore
content:
Education: BTech Computer Science
Years of Experience: 9
Prior Experience: SSE at Walmart Banglore
Date of the Offer: January 2025
Company: Oracle Cerner
Title/Level: Principle Member of Technical Staff
Location: banglore
Salary: INR 5600000
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: $75000 stock grant vested over 4 years (40%, 30%, 20% and 10%)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~INR 70 LPA Yearly (Including RSUs)
Other details: this is original offer, They did not do any negotiation.
